instructions: Knead like crazy, everything sticks to everything, this is the dough, your eyes are now set on it, married or single.
Waiting for the volume to double and it will come. You have nowhere to run, which is a shame.
Heat canola oil in a large, 1-liter pot.
Check if there are bubbles around a toothpick. This means we have reached the correct temperature, about one hundred and eight degrees.
Perforated with the forearm, not required.
Place in oil, being careful not to splash.
Taking a chopstick and checking the color below
If tanned, give a reversal for a few more minutes
Dip it in a plate with sugar and cinnamon or leave it plain without any sweetener.
Any topping she likes is no problem
